FuncDef: The display mac-address synchronization configuration command displays MAC synchronization configuration on a specified slot. The display mac-address synchronization configuration command displays MAC synchronization configuration on a specified slot.
CLIs: display mac-address synchronization configuration { all | slot <slot-id> }

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a slot ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.
